text: Deaver is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Bascom S. Deaver (born 1930), American physicist *Bascom Sine Deaver (1882–1944), American judge *Jeffery Deaver (born 1950), American writer *Michael Deaver (1938–2007), advisor to Ronald Reagan *Philip F. Deaver (born 1946), American writer *Richard Deaver (born 1931), American sailor ==See also== *Deaver, Wyoming, town in Wyoming, United States
title: Deaver
